lead_paragraph: SCHEURER--Edwin C.,June 1, 1933 - August 14, 2010. We are thinking of you and loving you on your 83rd Birthday. You are always in our hearts. We miss you and love you forever Edie. Your Children and Grandchildren 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  SCHEURER, EDWIN C.
